Castillo Copper Limited
Gerrard Hall
Non-Executive Chairman

interest_acquired_percent.justification: CCZ has agreed to acquire 85% of the highly prospective Harts Range Niobium, Uranium and Heavy Rare Earths Project via an earn-in arrangement

cash_payments_raw.justification: Exclusivity fee: the Company has paid a cash payment of $35,000 + GST to Audax for an exclusive right to undertake its due diligence on Audax and the Project until 20 November 2024 (Exclusivity Period)

share_payments_raw.justification: CCZ issuing the Audax Vendors an aggregate of 145,500,000 fully paid ordinary shares (Consideration Shares) at a deemed issue price of $0.005 per Share

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: CCZ issuing the Audax Vendors an aggregate of 145,500,000 fully paid ordinary shares (Consideration Shares) at a deemed issue price of $0.005 per Share

issued_share_price.justification: at a deemed issue price of $0.005 per Share

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: earn-in through the expenditure of AUD$375,000 on EL32513 over three years and a further $375,000 on EL32046 at the time in which it is included in the Joint Venture Agreement

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Exploration work will include reconnaissance programs, close-spaced geophysical surveys, detailed mapping and rock chip sampling, regional soil sampling, mineral characterisation studies, trenching and bulk sample test work, target generation and prioritisation, and drill-testing.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: upon commencement of production, Barfuss Corporation is entitled to a 2% net smelter royalty

coverage_area_raw.justification: Two granted tenements (EL 32046 and 32513) comprising a total 110 km2 tenement package

coverage_area_unit.justification: Two granted tenements (EL 32046 and 32513) comprising a total 110 km2 tenement package
